gitconfiglocal

parse the .git/config file into a useful data structure

example

```js var gitconfig = require(‘gitconfiglocal’);

gitconfig(‘./’,function(err,config){ console.log(config); /* prints: { core: { repositoryformatversion: ‘0’, filemode: true, bare: false, logallrefupdates: true }, remote: { origin: { url: ‘git@github.com:soldair/node-gitconfiglocal.git’, fetch: ‘+refs/heads/:refs/remotes/origin/’ } } } */ });

```
